Introduction

Son Dong Pyo, also known as Dongpyo, is a South Korean singer and lyricist under DSP Media.

In 2019, Dong Pyo participated in the Mnet survival show "Produce X 101". During the finale, he ranked 6th place, thus becoming a member of the boy group X1. He debuted with X1 on August 27, 2019, with the mini album "비상 : Quantum Leap".

On January 6, 2020, the agencies representing the members of X1 announced the group's disbandment due to not being able to reach a unanimous agreement following the "Produce 101" vote manipulation controversy.

On February 5, 2021, Dong Pyo was revealed as the fourth member of the boy group MIRAE under DSP Media. MIRAE debuted on March 17 with the mini album "Killa".

On July 9, 2024, DSP Media announced that MIRAE has concluded their activities and has disbanded with the contract terminations of all the members except Son Dong Pyo, who will continue his individual activities with the agency.

On August 7, 2024, he made his solo debut with the digital single Wave (2024).
